findings.title: ERC20Capped import is unnecessary
findings.description: `ERC20Capped` is currently imported by VanyToken, but it could be omitted since without implementation of a Mint function the token is effectively capped.

findings.title: Consider using a recent compiler version, and locking pragma
findings.description: The contract can be compiled with any version of the Solidity compiler 0.5, which may lead to potential issues. It is recommended to use a later version of the compiler (e.g., 0.5.13) and lock the pragma to ensure consistency.

findings.title: Consider using the keyword ether to improve readability of
findings.description: Using the keyword 'ether' can improve code readability and make it easier to reason about, especially when dealing with token supply. It also adds 18 decimal places to the variable.
